description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous piece-by-piece response to a comment questioning the truth about what happened with GARM: In second place, it’s Guiltypanacea with a related comment about Elon’s lawsuit: Pretty cute to claim GARM violated antitrust laws while also claiming Twitter is the singular “global town […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
